subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In his first singles match in more than 18 months, Fish held two match points in the third set at the BNP Paribas Open before losing to Ryan Harrison, 6-4, 4-6, 7-6 (3).
snippet: In his first singles match in more than 18 months, Fish held two match points in the third set at the BNP Paribas Open before losing to Ryan Harrison, 6-4, 4-6, 7-6 (3).
